metadata.description:
Part 1! 
Lovecraft lives! From the smash hit writing team behind Zombie Tales comes a collection of six different tales of dark, cosmic horror. Annihilation and 52's Keith Giffen pens a tale, writer of the Transformers Movie John Rogers writes his own. Creator of the Sci-Fi Network TV show EUREKA, Andrew Cosby, pens one, with EUREKA screenwriter Johanna Stokes creating "Love's Craft." Finally, Second Wave writer Michael Alan Nelson joins in on the fun with a stellar constellation of artists. A second helping of a completely new journey into classic horror from Wizard's Best New Publisher!
metadata.name: Cthulhu Tales, Vol. 1
